articles.author: Duncan Guy
articles.title: Durban riots - Myths debunked and strategy suspected - IOL
articles.description: Environmental and intelligence analyst Professor Anthony Turton zooms out as far as Eastern Europe and zooms in as close to home as Port Shepstone in his thinking about the recent riots and looting
articles.content:
This months rioting and looting were the manifestation of a concerted, sophisticated attempt to lubricate the traditional cleavage line in South Africa, which is race.
And it failed.
This is accord… [+4153 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: EU regulator endorses use of Moderna's COVID-19 shot for children - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: European Medicines Agency gives all clear for vaccine to be used in children aged between 12 and 17.
articles.content: The European Unions medicines regulator has recommended authorising Modernas COVID-19 vaccine for use in children aged between 12 and 17, marking the first time the shot has been approved for people … [+2438 chars]
